title: Prospek Saham Ramah Lingkungan ESG , Berharap Aliran Masuk Asing
description: Saham ramah lingkungan di BEI underperform dibanding IHSG 2025. Indeks ESG dan SRI-KEHATI naik tipis, IDX LQ45 Low Carbon turun. Prospek didorong investor asing.
